item.title: Watch: Royals and veterans mark VJ Day 80 years on
item.description: The King and Queen led a two-minute silence at a service in Staffordshire to commemorate 80 years since VJ Day.

item.title: Watch: Moment Trump and Putin meet in Alaska for Ukraine talks
item.description: This is the moment Donald Trump and Vladimir Putin exchange handshakes as they meet for a summit in Alaska.

item.title: One dead and several injured as Danish train hits tanker and derails
item.description: Local media report crash at railway crossing in southern Jutland involved lorry transporting farm waste.

item.title: Flash floods kill nearly 200 in Pakistan and Pakistan-administered Kashmir
item.description: The majority of deaths were recorded in Pakistan's mountainous Khyber Pakhtunkhwa area.

item.title: 'About our lives, but without our voice': Sidelined Ukrainians look on
item.description: Left uninvited to key talks, many Ukrainians look on with a mix of fatigue and mistrust.
